title: Experiment Metrics Snapshot
description: Structured record of metrics and timings from a pipeline stage (train, predict, diagnose, submit). Ensures reproducibility, comparability, and lineage tracking across runs.

run_id.description: Unique identifier for the run/session (UUID or hash).

stage.description: Pipeline stage this snapshot corresponds to.

metrics.description: Key numeric metrics. Includes competition score (GLL) and training diagnostics if available.

tags.description: Optional user-defined labels for experiment management.

config_hash.description: Hash of Hydra/DVC config snapshot used for this run.

created_at.description: Timestamp when metrics snapshot was generated.
